channel.description: so ive been makin this server almost got it to where i wanna hook some friends up on it so they can all play it but the only thing that im missing or having trouble with is gettin master fisher to work would like to have portals instead of adventurer, and the last thing that was keepin me from success for me was making NPC's in wild at dragon maze thanks for anyone that can help ;D

item.title: Sooo close ) =
item.dc:creator: @skarletdeath skarletdeath
item.description:
@skarletdeath wrote:

ok, so i got the portals workin also i got all my npc’s where i wantem prolly add more later really only thing i need help with is gettin the master fisher to work i read someones post on how to get to work on a thread but did’t seem to work if anyone could help out with that i’m sure its alot easier than i’m making it out to be and another easy problem i’m having is getting the damn drop rates right so if anyone would wanna post some reasonable drop rates for d long and axe from red drags be much appreciated i just can’t get the damn things to drop at a rare reasonable rate thanks for help if you can provide.

still no help ) =
